press-runner.useTerminal.auto: Use plugin command if the corresponding plugin is activated, otherwise fallback to terminal.
press-runner.useTerminal.never: Always run via plugin command (must be registered).
press-runner.useTerminal.desc: Global setting to determine whether to use terminal or plugin commands.
press-runner.commandsMap.python.useTermi: Use the plugin command to run Python if the corresponding extension is activated; otherwise, fall back to the terminal.
Always run Python via plugin command (must be registered).
Determines whether Python runs using the terminal or a plugin command.
press-runner.commandsMap.python.Commands: The ID of the plugin used for running Python code.
The command string used for running Python via the plugin.
The command string used for running Python via the terminal.
Configure the plugin ID and command to run Python.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.useTerminal.a: Use the plugin command to run C if the corresponding extension is activated; otherwise, fall back to the terminal.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.useTerminal.n: Always run C via plugin command (must be registered).
press-runner.commandsMap.c.useTerminal.d: Determines whether C runs using the terminal or a plugin command.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.Commands.plug: The ID of the plugin used for running C code.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.Commands.comm: The command string used for running C via the plugin.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.Commands.term: The command string used for running C via the terminal.
press-runner.commandsMap.c.Commands.desc: Configure the plugin ID and command to run C.
press-runner.commandsMap.cpp.useTerminal: Use the plugin command to run CPP if the corresponding extension is activated; otherwise, fall back to the terminal.
Always run CPP via plugin command (must be registered).
Determines whether CPP runs using the terminal or a plugin command.
press-runner.commandsMap.cpp.Commands.pl: The ID of the plugin used for running CPP code.
press-runner.commandsMap.cpp.Commands.co: The command string used for running CPP via the plugin.
press-runner.commandsMap.cpp.Commands.te: The command string used for running CPP via the terminal.
press-runner.commandsMap.cpp.Commands.de: Configure the plugin ID and command to run CPP.
